groups.name: box.libs.utilities.context
groups.description: Working context configuration properties for utilities library

groups.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys
groups.description: gRPC header key names for context propagation

groups.name: box.libs.utilities.security
groups.description: Security configuration properties for utilities library

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.user-provider-name
properties.description: Bean name of the user context data provider.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.x-agent-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for agent identifier.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-language-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user language.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-ip-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user IP (e.g. X-Forwarded-For).

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-id-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user ID.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-role-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user role.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-global-id-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user global ID.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.reactor-context-keys.user-key
properties.description: Reactor context key for current user.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.security.crypto.key
properties.description: Encryption key for crypto operations. Must be set via external configuration.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.security.token.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token signing. Must be set via external configuration.
